permafrost.tundra.data

Class IDataTextParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wm.util.coder.IDataCoder
      • permafrost.tundra.data.IDataTextParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataParser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IDataXMLParser

    public abstract class IDataTextParser
extends com.wm.util.coder.IDataCoder
implements IDataParser
    Serializes and deserializes IData documents to and from a text representation.
